name: Wounded Draugr
description: Decaying corpse of a former prisoner.

name: Corpse Watcher
description: Guard's body animated by dark forces.

name: Mara Spirit
description: A translucent wraith trailing black smoke.

name: Shadow Wraith
description: A semi-transparent spirit with glowing red eyes, trailing black smoke.

name: Ultimate Mara Spirit
description: A semi-transparent wraith with glowing red eyes, trailing black smoke.

name: Crystallized Draugr
description: A draugr encased in ice, wielding a deadly ice weapon.

name: Jotun Ice Warrior
description: A frost giant with glowing blue eyes and ice armor.

name: Architect of Shadows
description: A twisted figure cloaked in darkness, eyes glowing with malevolent power.
